name: Shree
greetingText: Your name is like the secret code to unlock the best laughs!
wishText: May the magic of love always be with you! üíñ
text2: That's what I was planning to do.

outroText: Now, come back and let me know if it touched your heart.
replayText: Or click, if you want to experience it again.
